definitions.body: security—Ge 34:25 + 41 t.; [[הַשְׁקֵט וׇבֶטַח]] Is 32:17 quietness and security = [[בְּהַשְׁקֵט וּבְבִטְחָה]] Is 30:15 (but prob. both infs.) elsewhere always adverb;—securely, [[ישׁב לבטח]] Le 25:18, Le 25:19, Le 26:5, Ju Jdg 18:7, 1Ki 5:5, Ps 4:9, Pr 3:29, Is 47:8, Je 32:37, Je 49:31, Ez Eze 28:26, Eze 34:25, Eze 34:28, Eze 38:8; Eze 38:11; Eze 38:14, Eze 39:6, Eze 39:26, Zep 2:15, Zec 14:11; [[ישׁב בטח]] De 12:10, 1Sa 12:11; [[שׁכן לבטח]] De 33:12, Ps 16:9, Je 23:6, Je 33:16; [[שׁכן בטח]] De 33:28, Pr 1:33; [[לבטח]] ([[היה]]) Job 24:23, Ez Eze 34:27; [[היה בטח]] Ju Jdg 8:11; [[הלך לבטח]] Pr 3:23; [[הלך בטח]] Pr 10:9; [[שׁכב לבטח]] Job 11:18, Ho 2:20; [[רבץ לבטח]] Is 14:30; [[נחה לבטח]] Ps 78:53; [[עבר בטח]] Mic 2:8; [[כושׁ בטח]] Cush (dwelling) securely Ez Eze 30:9 (pregnant construction, del. [[בטח]] Co); [[וַיׇּבאׁוּ עַל הָעִיר בֶּטַח]] and they came upon the city (dwelling) securely Ge 34:25 (J).
